local_intent: Execute grasp on grapes: ensure visibility, detect, open gripper, compute pinch grasp (grasp_grape), align with retry, pick, then verify stable hold.
assumptions: Pinch grasp is appropriate for the cluster
Alignment may require a brief retry
coherence_with_global: Consistent with global sequence around Pick: visibility fallback, DetectObject, OpenGripper, ComputeGraspPose(pinch)->grasp_grape, ApproachAndAlign (retried), Pick using grasp_grape, then ObjectInGripper and IsGraspStable.
